name: .3D4 File Extension
summary: Learn about .3D4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 3D image created by the second version of Atari's Stereo CAD-3D for storing three-dimensional objects; may contain up to 40 objects and includes the colors and lighting associated with the object.

content: More commonly seen with a .3D2 extension.
